scripts.build:fast: npm run inventoryAdminProd && npm run apiDocsProd && npm run bookingEngineProd && npm run corporateProd && npm run studioProd && npm run extranetProd && npm run paymentAdminProd && npm run paymentPortalProd && npm run paymentWidgetProd && npm run socialListProd && npm run travelAgentProd && npm run webComponentsProd
scripts.build:staging:fast: npm run inventoryAdminStaging && npm run apiDocsStaging && npm run bookingEngineStaging && npm run corporateStaging && npm run studioStaging && npm run extranetStaging && npm run paymentAdminStaging && npm run paymentPortalStaging && npm run paymentWidgetStaging && npm run socialListStaging && npm run travelAgentStaging && npm run webComponentsStaging
scripts.inventoryAdminWebpackBundleAnalyzer: npm run inventoryAdminProdWithStats && npx webpack-bundle-analyzer dist/apps/administration/stats.json
scripts.studioWebpackBundleAnalyzer: npm run studioProdWithStats && npx webpack-bundle-analyzer dist/apps/developer/stats.json
scripts.apiDocsWebpackBundleAnalyzer: npm run api-docsProdWithStats && npx webpack-bundle-analyzer dist/apps/api-docs/stats.json
scripts.bookingEngineWebpackBundleAnalyzer: npm run bookingEngineProdWithStats && npx webpack-bundle-analyzer dist/apps/booking-engine/stats.json
scripts.corporateWebpackBundleAnalyzer: npm run corporateProdWithStats && npx webpack-bundle-analyzer dist/apps/corporate/stats.json
scripts.extranetWebpackBundleAnalyzer: npm run extranetProdWithStats && npx webpack-bundle-analyzer dist/apps/extranet/stats.json
scripts.paymentAdminWebpackBundleAnalyzer: npm run paymentAdminProdWithStats && npx webpack-bundle-analyzer dist/apps/payment-admin/stats.json
scripts.paymentPortalWebpackBundleAnalyzer: npm run paymentPortalProdWithStats && npx webpack-bundle-analyzer dist/apps/payment-portal/stats.json
scripts.paymentWidgetProd: npx nx build --project payment-widget --configuration=production && npm run paymentWidgetPack
scripts.paymentWidgetStaging: npx nx build --project payment-widget --configuration=staging && npm run paymentWidgetPack
scripts.paymentWidgetWebpackBundleAnalyzer: npm run paymentWidgetProdWithStats && npx webpack-bundle-analyzer dist/apps/payment-widget/stats.json
scripts.socialListWebpackBundleAnalyzer: npm run socialListProdWithStats && npx webpack-bundle-analyzer dist/apps/social-list/stats.json
scripts.travelAgentWebpackBundleAnalyzer: npm run travelAgentProdWithStats && npx webpack-bundle-analyzer dist/apps/travel-agent/stats.json
scripts.webComponentsProd: node --max_old_space_size=16384 ./node_modules/.bin/nx build web-components --configuration=production && npm run webComponentsPack
scripts.webComponentsStaging: node --max_old_space_size=16384 ./node_modules/.bin/nx build web-components --configuration=staging && npm run webComponentsPack
scripts.webComponentsDev: node --max_old_space_size=16384 ./node_modules/.bin/nx build web-components --configuration=development && npm run webComponentsPack
scripts.webComponentsWebpackBundleAnalyzer: npm run webComponentsProdWithStats && npx webpack-bundle-analyzer dist/apps/web-components/stats.json
scripts.releaseAdministrationStagingToSentry: export SENTRY_ORG=wink2travel && export SENTRY_AUTH_TOKEN=617b4ae0ac5c4d52935924f20d48b375fe1336e52ea146e4a014b11d8af47e59 && export SENTRY_PROJECT=administration && npx sentry-cli releases new "$npm_package_version" && npx sentry-cli releases set-commits --auto "$npm_package_version" && npx sentry-cli releases files "$npm_package_version" upload-sourcemaps ./dist/apps/administration/browser && npx sentry-cli releases deploys "$npm_package_version" new -e staging && npx sentry-cli releases finalize "$npm_package_version"

scripts.deployAdministrationStagingToFirebase: npm run inventoryAdminStaging && npm run releaseAdministrationStagingToSentry && npx firebase deploy -P inventoryAdminStaging --public dist/apps/administration/browser
scripts.deployAdministrationToFirebase: npm run inventoryAdminProd && npm run releaseAdministrationToSentry && npx firebase deploy -P administration --public dist/apps/administration/browser
scripts.deployBookingEngineStagingToFirebase: npm run bookingEngineStaging && npm run releaseBookingEngineStagingToSentry && npx firebase deploy -P bookingEngineStaging --public ./dist/apps/booking-engine/browser
scripts.deployBookingEngineToFirebase: npm run bookingEngineProd && npm run releaseBookingEngineToSentry && npx firebase deploy -P bookingEngine --public ./dist/apps/booking-engine/browser
scripts.deployCorporateStagingToFirebase: npm run corporateStaging && npm run releaseCorporateStagingToSentry && npx firebase deploy -P corporateStaging --public dist/apps/corporate/browser
scripts.deployCorporateToFirebase: npm run corporateProd && npm run releaseCorporateToSentry && npx firebase deploy -P corporate --public dist/apps/corporate/browser
scripts.deployDeveloperStagingToFirebase: npm run studioStaging && npm run releaseStudioStagingToSentry && npx firebase deploy -P studioStaging --public dist/apps/developer/browser

scripts.deployWebComponentsToFirebase: npm run webComponentsProd && npm run releaseWebComponentsToSentry && npx firebase deploy -P  webComponents --public dist/apps/web-components/browser
scripts.releaseAllStagingToSentry: npm run releaseBookingEngineStagingToSentry && npm run releaseExtranetStagingToSentry && npm run releaseAdministrationStagingToSentry && npm run releaseCorporateStagingToSentry && npm run releaseStudioStagingToSentry && npm run releaseWebComponentsStagingToSentry && npm run releasePaymentAdminStagingToSentry && npm run releasePaymentPortalStagingToSentry && npm run releasePaymentWidgetStagingToSentry && npm run releaseSocialListStagingToSentry
scripts.releaseAllToSentry: npm run releaseBookingEngineToSentry && npm run releaseExtranetToSentry && npm run releaseAdministrationToSentry && npm run releaseCorporateToSentry && npm run releaseStudioToSentry && npm run releaseTravelAgentToSentry && npm run releaseWebComponentsToSentry && npm run releasePaymentAdminToSentry && npm run releasePaymentPortalToSentry && npm run releasePaymentWidgetToSentry && npm run releaseSocialListToSentry
